segments.text: I'm really bothered by that growing puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's spreading so quickly from the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is already standing in it, which makes me incredibly nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks so slippery, and anyone could easily lose their footing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find myself getting quite angry that she hasn't noticed it yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children could also step into it if they fall off that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Imagine slipping and hitting your head on the hard kitchen floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a preventable accident, and that's what's so frustrating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just streaming down the cabinet doors, ruining everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm just surprised by her absolute lack of awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to intervene and turn that faucet off immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire scene is making me feel very anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR
